verses.text: \w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* not in the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*, nor \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*, nor \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* of the \w scornful|strong="H3887"\w*.\f + \fr 1.1 \ft ungodly: or, wicked\f*

But his \w delight|strong="H2656"\w* \add is\add* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and in his \w law|strong="H8451"\w* doth he \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And he shall be like a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* by the \w rivers|strong="H6388"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, that bringeth \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* his \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* in his \w season|strong="H6256"\w*; his \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* also shall not \w wither|strong="H5034"\w*; and whatsoever he \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* shall \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*.\f + \fr 1.3 \ft wither: Heb. fade\f*
The \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w* \add are\add* not so: but \add are\add* like the \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w* which the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* driveth \w away|strong="H5086"\w*.

Therefore the \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w* shall not \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, nor \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: but the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.
